<<<Dusts off her old files>>> LOL heres a couple Ben recorded doing an investigation in Crooked Mile graveyard a while back. Since your stuff got stolen I am not sure if you still had these backed up Ben. (I got all that old stuff still LOL)
   
  Plus "I" posted them so nobody can say nothing to you about it rofl. 
   
  I think you need to make a clause that all paranormal evidence you collect you be able to publish in return for investigating thier properties.

  Misty

  hummmmmpf!
  lol
  amy
